event1.title: Mission Peak Hiking next Monday, wanna join?
event1.description: If you have never been to Mission Peak, you couldn't say you live in the Bay Area. Join us on next Monday and let's conquer the peak!
event1.introduction: I am a student at SCU and I love hiking a lot.

event2.title: Thanksgiving Party at SF downtown, shoot it!
event2.description: Have no idea what to do on Thanksgiving? Join us! You can meet a lot of interesting guys and have a wonderful memory!.
event2.introduction: We are a group full of interesting people and we would like to make amazing things happen together

event3.title: Looking for partners together for Lake Tahoe Skiing next Sunday
event3.description: I plan to go skiing at Lake Tahoe next Sunday, looking for friends who would go together. It would be better if your car is AWD.
event3.introduction: I am a Snow Man every winter and woulk like to go skiing every two weeks.
event3.address: 1093 Ski Run Blvd, South Lake Tahoe, CA 96150

event4.title: BBQ Party for Chinese Student Union, Join us!
event4.description: This Sunday the Chinese Student Union at Santa Clara University would host a BBQ party. Join us for unlimited BBQ, Beers and Snacks!!!
event4.introduction: I am the chief of Chinese Student Union at SCU and have been managing this group for 2 years.
event4.address: 500 El Camino Real, Santa Clara, CA 95053

event5.title: SCU interview group
event5.description: Anybody is prepping for interviews? I am looking for partners to practice together. We can do mock interviews!
event5.introduction: I am a graduate student at SCU in CS.
event5.address: 500 El Camino Real, Santa Clara, CA 95053

event6.title: Photography Workshop, join us!
event6.description: Want to improve your skills when taking a photo? Want to make your pictures like those influencers? Join us and get your best photo ever!
event6.introduction: I have been working as a photographer for 5 years now.
event6.address: 500 El Camino Real, Santa Clara, CA 95053

event7.title: Free GYM Classes
event7.description: Feel free to schedule the free GYM classes by clicking here. I would like to share my experience and offer free classes to those who want to start exercising in GYM.
event7.introduction: I am a student at SCU and I have been in GYM for exercise for 8 years.
event7.address: 500 El Camino Real, Santa Clara, CA 95053

ads1.title: Welcome to Orangetheory Fitness!
ads1.description: Welcome to Orangetheory Fitness, the energizing group interval fitness concept that is sweeping the nation! Orangetheory Fitness is a one-of-a-kind workout broken into intervals of cardiovascular and strength training, using a variety of equipment including treadmills, rowing, TRX straps, and free weights to tone your body and gain energy throughout the day.
ads1.introduction: Orangetheory Fitness San Jose - Communication Hill
ads1.address: 551 W Capitol Expy Santa Clara, CA 95050

ads2.title: Big discounts for our Happy Hours!
ads2.description: Breaking news! We will have 20% off discounts for the Happy Hours in June. The hours are: Sat - Tue: 4pm to 5:30pm, Wed - Fri: 2pm to 5:30pm, Fri & Sat: 10pm - Midnight.

ads3.title: Big promotion for new members!
ads3.description: We will offer gift card of $50 to the newly joined members. Come and join us now!

ads4.title: Welcome to our Dentist's Office!
ads4.description: With good humor, high ethical standards and a gentle touch, Dr. Lambert approaches your visit with a calm and practical manner. If you are looking for a life-long dentist, visit our office.
ads4.address: 251 Oconnor Dr, Ste 3, Santa Clara, CA 95060

ads5.title: Join our Elements Wellness Discount Program!
ads5.description: The Elements Wellness Program™ is designed to provide every Elements Massage™ client with an opportunity to improve their health and wellness through therapeutic massage therapy.
ads5.address: 1604 W Campbell Ave, Santa Clara, CA 95045

campus1.title: ECW Hackathon Competition
campus1.description: We are inviting your engineering students to sign up and compete in the Edge Computing World Hackathon December 11, 2019 at the Computer History Museum in Silicon Valley.
campus1.introduction: I am Senior Product Marketing Manager working at Topio Networks

campus2.title: Upcoming PeopleSoft/eCampus outage
campus2.description: Please be advised that eCampus and the PeopleSoft Financials systems will be coming down this weekend to perform some required maintenance.
campus2.introduction: I am the Director of Enterprise Applications, who is responsible for SCU's PeopleSoft/eCampus
campus2.address: 500 El Camino Real, Santa Clara, CA 95053

campus3.title: Global Community Hour
campus3.description: We hope you will join us at the Global Community Hour today, November 21 from 4 to 5:30 pm in the in the in Vari Hall Foyer.
campus3.introduction: I am the Director of International Students and Scholars

campus4.title: 11/19 South Leavey Walkway Closed
campus4.description: Starting tomorrow, November 19th, the South Leavey Walkway will be closed through Friday afternoon. Please be mindful in areas where there is a reported change of traffic patterns and where people are working on the roadways.
campus4.introduction: I am the Director of Parking & Transportation Services
campus4.address: 500 El Camino Real, Santa Clara, CA 95053

campus5.title: Cowell Center hours 12/7/19
campus5.description: The Cowell Center will be closed Thursday, November 7th until 1:00 pm. Cowell Center will be open Thursday, November 7th from 1:00 pm to 5:00 pm.
campus5.introduction: I am the staff working at Cowell Center
